title: [b]Sketch Action[/b]
desc:
Choose between short, professional looking, or no Sketch action.
[b](Default: Professional Color Pencil)[/b]

title: [b]Rough Sketch Lines[/b]
desc:
Only works with professional action, adds rough lines (and render time).
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Draft Sketch Lines[/b]
desc:
Only works with professional action, adds draft sketch lines (and render time).
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Black and White[/b]
desc:
Enable this to render sketch image without color.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Sketch Manual Editing[/b]
desc:
Pause rendering at the end of the sketch effect for manual intervention.
[b](Default: False)[/b]
